uientry.s:
dofile "data/ui/templates/template.fe_button_standard.lua"
local this = UIComponent(Address) function OnSelect() UIComponent(this:Parent()):LuaCall("StartCampaign") end

local current_selected = nil
function InitState() for n=1, Component.Call("ChildCount") do Component.Call("Children["..(n-1).."].LuaCall", "SetState", "normal") end if Component.GetProperty("Allow None Selected") == 0 then Component.Call("Children[0].LuaCall", "SetState", "selected") current_selected = 1 end end
function Notify(value, msg, address) print(msg) if value == Component.Messages.StateChange then if msg == "down" and Component.GetProperty("Single Selection") == 1 then for n=1, Component.Call("ChildCount") do if address ~= Component.Call("Children["..(n-1).."].Address") then Component.Call("Children["..(n-1).."].LuaCall", "SetState", "normal") else current_selected = n end end elseif msg == "selected_down" then if Component.GetProperty("Allow None Selected") == 0 then for n=1,Component.Call("ChildCount") do if address == Component.Call("Children["..(n-1).."].Address") then Component.Call("Children["..(n-1).."].LuaCall", "SetState", "selected") end end else current_selected = nil end end end end
function GetSelectedIndex() return current_selected end

function OnSelect() local this = UIComponent(Address) if this:CurrentState() ~= "inactive" then local panel = UIComponent(this:Parent("sp_episodic_campaign")) panel:LuaCall("SelectCampaign", 3) Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Notify", Component.Messages.StateChange, Component.Call("CurrentState"), Address) end end
function SetState(state) Component.SetState(state) end

function OnSelect() local this = UIComponent(Address) if this:CurrentState() ~= "inactive" then local panel = UIComponent(this:Parent("sp_episodic_campaign")) panel:LuaCall("SelectCampaign", 4) Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Notify", Component.Messages.StateChange, Component.Call("CurrentState"), Address) end end
function SetState(state) Component.SetState(state) end

function UpdateSlider() local value = Component.GetProperty("Parent.Value") - Component.GetProperty("stepSize") Component.SetProperty("Parent.Value", value) Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Update") end

function UpdateSlider() local value = Component.GetProperty("Parent.Value") + Component.GetProperty("stepSize") Component.SetProperty("Parent.Value", value) Component.Call("Parent.LuaCall", "Update") end

state.unicode: "Ceterum censeo Cartaginem esse delendam", inquit Senator.
